hanzi-su-wiki:
逮

Значения

Настигать

Мнемоника

Двигаться 辶, дабы настичь 隶 (рукой 彐 схватить за хвост).
purpleculture_pinyin:
dǎi
(coll.) to catch; to seize
(колл.) поймать; захватить

dài
(literary) to arrest; to seize; to overtake; until
(литературный) арестовать; захватить; обогнать; до того как
rtega_mnemonic:
逮逮RSseize, catch, reach, arrive, chase
  • chase ⻌ somebody with a broom 隶 or catch him
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 隶 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
狗逮老鼠 [ gǒu dǎi lǎo shǔ ]: lit. a dog who catches mice; to be meddlesome (idiom)
逮捕 [ dài bǔ ]: to arrest; to apprehend; an arrest
权所不逮 [ quán suǒ bù dài ]: beyond one's power (idiom)
力有未逮 [ lì yǒu wèi dài ]: beyond one's reach or power (to do sth)
不逮捕特权 [ bù dài bǔ tè quán ]: the right of immunity from arrest afforded by the Taiwan ROC Constitution, for the duration of meetings, unless caught actually committing a crime, to members of the National Assembly, the Legislative Yuan, or a supervisory committee
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 隶 [ lì ] subservient; servant
heisig_chinese_memo: Think police roadblocks. They act like road sieves, letting good people through but arresting criminals.
heisig_constituent: apprehend, sieve, rake, grains of rice, road
heisig_story: Think of apprehending criminals. The elements are: sieve . . . road.
koohiiStory1: Think police roadblocks. They act like road sieves, letting good people through but apprehending criminals.
koohiiStory2: In Space Balls, they were combing the desert in order to apprehend Lone Star. Picture Dark Helmet saying "Combing the desert failed, we must now sieve the road!".
jp_example_words: 逮捕(たいほ): arrest, apprehension, capture
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Someone took your scooter and used a brush and some water to take off all the paint, and now you need to apprehend them!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Not only did they steal your scooter, but they tried to make it look like it wasn't even yours anymore. Now you and all the cops are chasing this dude down on police scooters and you're going to apprehend him!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You catch up to the thief and apprehend him by tying him down with the tie (たい) from around your neck!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It's a really nice tie you use to apprehend him, so even though the scooter thief is struggling and fighting, he can't get away.
Ru_Radicals: 込 (внутрь), ヨ, 水 (вода), 隶 (раб)
Ru_trainchinese:
dǎi: (глаг) хватать, ловить
dài: (графема) хватать, ловить (то же значение, что и для 逮 третьим тоном; используется только в 逮捕)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if the slave (隶) moves (⻌), he's apprehended
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Think police roadblocks. They act like road sieves, letting good people through but arresting criminals.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "辵" and " li ", the original meaning is and, and to. "Said Wen": "Tang Da, Ji Ye. Cong Yu, Li Sheng." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Eighteenth Year of Cheng Gong": "Jin Mourning Gong was in the dynasty, he first ordered a hundred officials, he was responsible for charity, and widows were arrested. , Vibrates and stagnates, and suffers fatigue.” Yang Bojun’s note: “Benefits to the widower and widow.

" Catch " can mean connecting and continuing. "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yushang": "Wang Congzhi, those who make use of Jin, the Dao can catch them."

" Catch " also means arrest. "Historical Records: Five Family Aristocrats": "Please catch all evidences of Bosuo and traitors."

" Catch " is also used as a preposition to mean taking advantage. "Zuo Zhuan‧ The Four Years of Ding Gong": "The arrest of Wu is undecided, and the king will take his part."

" Catch " is also used as an adverb, meaning only. "Han Shu·Wang Mang Chuan 1": "Keep yourselves down and catch your food." Yan Shigu's note: "You have to be rough and only enough."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of "辵" and " li ", the original meaning is and, and to.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「隶」聲，本義為及、及至。《說文》：「唐逮，及也。从辵，隶聲。」《左傳‧成公十八年》：「晉悼公即位於朝，始命百官，施舍已責，逮鰥寡，振廢滯，匡乏困。」楊伯峻注：「施惠及于鰥夫寡婦。」

　　「逮」可表示連及、接續。《國語‧周語上》：「王從之，使於晉者，道相逮也。」

　　「逮」也表示逮捕。《史記‧五宗世家》：「請逮勃所與姦諸證左。」

　　「逮」也用作介詞，表示趁。《左傳‧定公四年》：「逮吳之未定，君取其分焉。」

　　「逮」還用作副詞，表示僅。《漢書‧王莽傳上》：「克身自約，糴食逮給。」顏師古注：「纔得粗及僅足而已。」
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」，「隶」聲，本義為及、及至。

逮捕(たいほ): arrest, apprehension, capture

從「 辵 」，「 隶 」聲，本義為及、及至。《說文》：「唐逮，及也。从辵，隶聲。」《左傳‧成公十八年》：「晉悼公即位於朝，始命百官，施舍已責，逮鰥寡，振廢滯，匡乏困。」楊伯峻注：「施惠及于鰥夫寡婦。」 「 逮 」可表示連及、接續。《國語‧周語上》：「王從之，使於晉者，道相逮也。」 「 逮 」也表示逮捕。《史記‧五宗世家》：「請逮勃所與姦諸證左。」 「 逮 」也用作介詞，表示趁。《左傳‧定公四年》：「逮吳之未定，君取其分焉。」 「 逮 」還用作副詞，表示僅。《漢書‧王莽傳上》：「克身自約，糴食逮給。」顏師古注：「纔得粗及僅足而已。」
From the sound of " 辵" and " li", the original meaning is and, and to. "Said Wen": "Tang Da, Ji Ye. Cong Yu, Li Sheng." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Eighteenth Year of Cheng Gong": "Jin Mourning Gong was in the dynasty, he first ordered a hundred officials, he was responsible for charity, and widows were arrested. , Vibrates and stagnates, and suffers fatigue.” Yang Bojun’s note: “Benefits to the widower and widow. " Catch" can mean connecting and continuing. "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yushang": "Wang Congzhi, those who make use of Jin, the Dao can catch them." " Catch" also means arrest. "Historical Records: Five Family Aristocrats": "Please catch all evidences of Bosuo and traitors." " Catch" is also used as a preposition to mean taking advantage. "Zuo Zhuan‧ The Four Years of Ding Gong": "The arrest of Wu is undecided, and the king will take his part." " Catch" is also used as an adverb, meaning only. "Han Shu·Wang Mang Chuan 1": "Keep yourselves down and catch your food." Yan Shigu's note: "You have to be rough and only enough."

逮字的基本解释

逮
dài
到，及：力有未逮。
捉拿：逮捕。逮系。
捕抓捉放

逮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dài］
［《廣韻》徒耐切，去代，定。］
［《廣韻》特計切，去霽，定。］
(1)追上；赶上。
(2)及；及至。
(3)连及；接续。
(4)及得上；比得上。
(5)逮捕。
(6)介词。趁。
(7)副词。犹仅。
(8)昔；以前。
(9)姓。
[②]［dì］
［《廣韻》特計切，去霽，定。］
见“逮2逮”、“逮2行”。
[③]［dǎi］
方言。捉；抓。

capture, reach

逮字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　逮； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1259第18
〔古文〕逯【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】徒戴切【正韻】度耐切，?音代。【說文】及也。【易·繫辭】水火相逮。【註】水火不相入而相逮及。【書·周官】夙夜不逮。　又【正韻】追也。【前漢·?法志】逮繫。【註】辭之所及，則追捕之，故謂之逮。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?蕩亥切，音迨。與迨同。　又【廣韻】特計切【集韻】【韻會】大計切，?音第。逮逮，安和貌。【禮·孔子閒居】威儀逮逮。　又叶吐內切，音退。【前漢·郊祀歌】靑陽開動，根荄以遂。膏潤幷愛，跂行畢逮。

考證：〔【前漢·郊祀歌】靑陽開動，根荄以遂。膏潤幷受，跂行必逮。〕　謹照原文受改愛。必改畢。
逮字的源字形

逮字的起名意思

指捉，捉拿。

[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　 Da; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1259 Page 18
[Ancient text] Lu [Guangyun] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Tu Daiqie [Zhengyun] Tolerant cutting,? Sound generation. [Said the text] and also. [Yi·Ci] Catch the fire and water. [Note] Water and fire do not intersect but catch each other. [Book·Zhou Guan] Su Ye didn't catch it.　[Zheng Yun] Chase it again. [Previous Han·Fazhi] Catch the line. [Note] As far as the words are concerned, they are hunted down, so they are called arrests.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Danghai cut, sound. Same as you.　[Guang Yun] Special plan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Great plan cut, the sound of the first. Catch catch, An and appearance. [Li·Confucius's Leisure Residence] Catch and arrest with majesty.　The leaf vomits and cuts inward again, and the sound fades. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Song] Qianyang starts to move, the roots are succumbed to success. Ointment and love, stumbling and catching. Textual research: [[Previous Han·Jiao Si Song] Qianyang started, and the roots were successful. If the cream is moisturized, it will be caught if you stumble. 〕 　 I would like to be changed and loved according to the original text. Must be changed.

(缺)
逮 dai
字原作“隶”(dci,与简化字“隶”
[I,隸]不是同一个字)。金文的字形
像一只手抓住了兽类的尾巴。本义
是“捕获”。后来增加“定”(chuo,即
“L”)旁,表示行动义。
行
(同楷书)
甲骨文
小篆
隶
书
者
书
草
书
简化字
年 未毒
速志
(недостаток)
Поймай дай
Исходный иероглиф - «Ли» (dci, что не то же самое, что упрощенное слово «Ли» [I, Li]).
Надписи имеют форму руки, схватившей зверя за хвост.
Первоначальное значение - «захват».
Позже рядом с ним была добавлена ​​буква «定» (чуо, то есть «L») для обозначения права на действие.
писец
От
Упрощенные символы
Годы не отравлены
Сужи
dǎi, dài
I dǎi
разг. хватать, ловить; арестовывать; схватить; поймать
猫会逮老鼠 кошки ловят (умеют ловить) мышей
逮入狱中 схватить (поймать, арестовать) и бросить в тюрьму
逮苦子 хлебнуть горя, попасть в беду
II dài
1) только в сочет. хватать, ловить; арестовывать; схватить; поймать
2) книжн. достигать, доставать
3) воспользоваться (моментом, случаем)
Radicals: 聿, 水  (brush, water, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
Someone took your scooter and used a brush and some water to take off all the paint, and now you need to apprehend them!
Not only did they steal your scooter, but they tried to make it look like it wasn't even yours anymore. Now you and all the cops are chasing this dude down on police scooters and you're going to apprehend him!
Reading Mnemonic
You catch up to the thief and apprehend him by tying him down with the tie (たい) from around your neck!
It's a really nice tie you use to apprehend him, so even though the scooter thief is struggling and fighting, he can't get away.

込 (внутрь), ヨ, 水 (вода), 隶 (раб)
